name: Me and My Missile Launcher
description:
You only have one missile, let's make it count.

Controls:

Move - WASD - Hold W to jump higher

Shoot missile - Arrow keys

R to restart

When I'm with you, my heart is alight,

It burns like the fire made when we fight,

So onto my hardened shoulder you mount,

Only one round in you, let's make it count.

Use the momentum from your rocket launcher to get around.

M to toggle music

N to toggle audio

Be patient - the first load takes time. :)
